meanings.sent1: The events were arranged chronologically in the history book.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the lessons chronologically, starting from the earliest to the latest.
meanings.sent3: I tried to eat my lunch chronologically, starting with dessert first!
meanings.sent4: Her memories played out in her mind chronologically, like a movie reel.
meanings.sent5: The detective organized the clues chronologically to solve the mystery.

meanings.definition: According to the order of time
meanings.sent1: The files were sorted chronologically by date.
meanings.sent2: The novel was written chronologically, following the protagonist's journey.
meanings.sent3: I attempted to do my homework chronologically, but ended up starting with the last question.
meanings.sent4: The music playlist was set to play songs chronologically, from oldies to modern hits.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted the mural chronologically, capturing each moment in time.

meanings.sent1: The numbers were listed chronologically from one to ten.
meanings.sent2: The steps in the recipe were presented chronologically for easy following.
meanings.sent3: I tried to watch the episodes chronologically, but accidentally skipped one.
meanings.sent4: The runner completed the race chronologically, passing each checkpoint with determination.
meanings.sent5: The pages of the book turned chronologically, revealing the unfolding story.
